question:
Consider the following events: 
1. First Round Table Conference 
2. Pakistan Declaration 
3. Poona Pact 
4. Gandhi Irwin Pact 
Which among the following represents the correct chronological order of the above events?
explanation: First Round Table Conference (November 1930 – January 1931). Gandhi Irwin Pact (5 March 1931). Poona Pact (24 September 1932). Pakistan Declaration (In the annual session of the All India Muslim League held in Lahore on 22–24 March 1940).
